meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Darryl Adams Nola Wegman David Cuneo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2607.

td.p: Darryl Adams, an attorney and real estate broker from North Potomac, Maryland
Nola Wegman, a retired English professor from Valparaiso, Indiana
David Cuneo, a former history teacher from Reisterstown, Maryland

tr.td: ZOOLOGY
GAMBLING
TV SITCOMS
GARDENING
RIVERS
MUSICAL QUOTES
